Description:
Detects DLL sideloading of unsigned "mfdetours.dll". Executing "mftrace.exe" can be abused to attach to an arbitrary process and force load any DLL named "mfdetours.dll" from the current directory of execution.

Author: Nasreddine Bencherchali (Nextron Systems)
Sigma Repository: [GitHub](https://github.com/SigmaHQ/sigma)
Name: Unsigned Mfdetours.DLL Sideloading
Query: sourcetype='windows-sysmon' eql select * from _source_ where (image_loaded like '%\mfdetours.dll' and  not (image_loaded like '%:\program files (x86)\windows kits\10\bin\%' and signature_status = 'valid'))
